data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Erwin, Terry L. (2004): The beetle family Carabidae of Costa Rica: The genera of the Cryptobatida group of subtribe Agrina, tribe Lebiini, with new species and notes on their way of life (Insecta: Coleoptera). Zootaxa 662: 1-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158702
